text: Adriaan Jacobus Botha was a South African flying ace of World War II, credited with 5 kills. He was shot down south of Bir Hacheim by a Bf -109 from I/JG27 on 14 June 1941. ==References== Category:South African World War II flying aces Category:1921 births Category:1941 deaths Category:South African Air Force personnel of World War II Category:South African military personnel killed in World War II
title: Adriaan Botha (SAAF officer)
